short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Karoke Party Time!  Search both YouTube and Ultimate-Guitar.com for Karaoke Songs and Guitar Chords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Karoke Party Time! This extension lets you pull up a karokee version of a song from YouTube on one tab and the Guitar Chords for that song on another tab so you can play along with the Karokee Song. Search both YouTube and Ultimate-Guitar.com for Karaoke Songs and Guitar Chords.  Just type in "ss" to pull up the search for SongSearc (SS)  then type in the song you want to play!
